half_articles.title: Amazing New Jersey Brothers Walk to California & Raise $70,000 for Restaurant Workers
half_articles.body: Near the end of the 2021 summer, two brothers set off on an epic journey that had an amazing goal; to see the US and help those in need.

half_articles.title: Dunkin' Donuts Customer Gives an Employee a New Home so that She Keeps Up with the Excellent Customer Service
half_articles.body: This Dunkin' Donuts employee in Ohio got the surprise of a lifetime from one very loyal customer. The friendship of Suzanne Burke and Ebony Johnson started at the drive-thru where Johnson worked several years ago.

half_articles.title: World's Most Premature Baby Defies 1 Percent Survival Odds & Breaks the Guinness Record
half_articles.body: Michelle Butler was 21 weeks pregnant with her twins (boy and girl) when she felt contractions. Her sister drove her to the hospital and Butler prayed for contractions to stop.

half_articles.title: 31-Year-Old Man Invited an 89-Year-Old Neighbour to Live with Him & Spend Her Last Days Together
half_articles.body: This is the most amazing story about an unusual friendship that lasted shortly but brought so much positivity and happiness. It's touching and inspiring. It shows the power of kindness.
